CustomField.formula:
IF ( AND(aecm__Active__c = True, ISPICKVAL(aecm__Maturity__c, "Undefined")), 0.5, IF ( AND(aecm__Active__c = True, ISPICKVAL(aecm__Maturity__c, "Defined")), 1, IF ( AND(aecm__Active__c = True, ISPICKVAL(aecm__Maturity__c, "Optimizing")), 1.5, IF ( AND(aecm__Active__c = True, ISPICKVAL(aecm__Maturity__c, "Leading")), 2, 0 ))))
/*original formula: CASE( Maturity__c, "Undefined", 0.5, "Defined", 1,"Optimizing",1.5,"Leading",2,0)*/
CustomField.inlineHelpText: based on the value selected in the picklist field "Maturity". If undefined = .5, Defined = 1, Optimizing = 1.5, Leading = 2 and the default is 0
CustomField.label: Maturity Score
